snippet.title: Danchi Days: Reveal Trailer (Cute Post-Cozy Japanese Adventure for Hamtaro/Earthbound/MOON Fans!)
snippet.description:
Subscribe for updates and wishlist Danchi Days: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3107530/Danchi_Days/

(Note: this trailer is outdated, we have changed the # of characters to 100)

Inspired by games like Hamtaro, EarthBound, MOON Remix RPG, fans of those eras will feel right at home!

Laugh, cry, and feel awe in this cute adventure game about inviting characters to a Japanese summer festival! Surf the internet to learn their quirks and desires, then use your senses to uncover the unseen wonders of a Y2K, GBA-inspired world. 

In an old danchi (Japanese housing complex), there used to be a yearly summer festival. Alas, the residents have aged, and the once-loved tradition is now on hold. But our protagonist, Hoshino, decides to revive it. Hand out flyers to let everyone know the festival’s back!

Subscribe for updates on the game! Danchi Days is being made by sandy powder, mogumu, and Melos Han-Tani (Anodyne Series, Angeline Era, etc)
